attributes.action: Soldiers get danger pay when they fight wars so should the NHS fighting CV-19
attributes.additional_details: Because they are doing a dangerous job risking their own lives
attributes.background: Hazard pay for NHS staff involved in fighting covid-19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
